about_the_game:
GamePlay

Enjoy a sensual story while completing tricky puzzles!
Connect the numbers sequentially, using all of the squares on the board
After completing a puzzle, you will unlock a sexy new image and the next part of the story!
Can you complete every puzzle and meet all of the demon girls?!

Story Background

You are known as "The Brave", a lone hunter that kills the demons that plague the human world. But no one knows your true intentions.
You target only female demons and have your way with them after defeating them in battle. This story begins when you decide to storm the Demon Queen's Castle in search of prey.
What will happen there?

Characters

Meraya:

A vampire demon who lives off human blood and can turn into mist to travel quickly through the air undetected. Her beauty is alluring, but she prefers solitude and avoids contact with others.

Melissa:

A succubus demon with the ability to control men through their lustful desires. She can be gentle or fierce depending on how she feels about an individual.

Lilith:

The Queen of the demons. She rules her kingdom from within her castle. Powerful and cunning, with an insatiable appetite for men's souls which she uses to maintain her power.

Features

  • 20 sexy and erotic images of the four beautiful demon girls.
  • A fantastical erotic story with demons who have unique personalities.
  • You can skip the puzzles if you just want to enjoy the story. (Press Enter during a puzzle).
  • CG Gallery mode. (Click the left and right buttons next to the CG after completing a puzzle).

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains a large amount of extremely sexual content.
It may not be appropriate for all audiences.
Please make your own judgment before playing the game whether you meet the requirements for playing such games.
The story is purely fictional.
All characters appearing in this game are adults over 18 years old.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04 or higher; SteamOS
  • Processor: 4GHz+
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB
  • Storage: 800 MB available space
